attributes.action: Scotland to pày for second referendum not the English tax payers
attributes.background: I am British citizen started working at 15yrs old and worked until I retired.Scotland is part of the uk.

rejection.details:
If you want Scotland to pay the full cost of another Referendum to leave the UK, if one is held, we could accept a petition on that. 

If you don't want there to be a second Scottish independence referendum, you could sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/134361
